Atklājot bezbailīgos. Dokumentālu filmu cikls (oriģinālvalodas izvēle)
Chasing UFOs
programme.desc: For decades, the skies above the sprawling desert sands of Roswell, New Mexico have been home to thousands of reports of unidentified flying objects. But one particular home video has the Chasing UFO's team in hot-pursuit of the truth. Does the mysterious video in question really show an actual crash landing of an alien spacecraft? The team look into this and investigate the alleged 1947 crash site under the cover of darkness, and armed with night vision gear.

programme.title: Chasing UFOs
programme.desc: The saying, "Everything is bigger in Texas" proves to be true when Ryder, James, and Ben investigate reports of mysterious lights spotted in the skies over two Texas towns. The team begins tracking stories from over 30 witnesses who all share similar testimonies – seeing strange lights in the sky. Once they have gathered information, they head to a clearing where sightings were reported…and Ryder thinks she spots something mysterious in the sky! Eager to solve the mystery, they meet up with Pilot Steve Allen who demonstrates how it would be possible to mistake two airplanes flying in formation for one massive object.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: Much as technology leaps forward during times of war, the Ebola outbreak that began in 2014 is forcing medical science to evolve as quickly as the virus it's fighting. This horror is provoking a revolution that may give birth to a world virtually free of pathogens. Scientists and medical practitioners working at the front lines of disease prevention and control are finding breakthrough ways to fight pandemic viruses.

programme.title: Breakthrough
programme.desc: Chances are you either know, or you are, a cyborg: a person who is aided or enhanced by embedded technology, such as artificial limbs or pacemakers. But advances in science are taking us beyond replacement parts and into a new realm. They are expanding the range of our senses and changing the nature of the human body and mind.

programme.title: Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: Is a "zombie apocalypse" simply a concept of fiction or could an infectious disease REALLY turn humanity into a race of vicious, seething monsters? The truth just might shock you! NGC examines one all too real scenario -- a pandemic caused by a mutated rabies virus. Experts from the fields of medicine, biology and the social sciences explain what could happen if humanity faced a deadly contagion for which there was is no cure. Through stunning dramatizations, watch as the virus makes its way from the depths of the ocean to every corner of the Earth turning humans and animals alike into individual vehicles of brutal destruction.

programme.title: Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: Do amazing breakthroughs in technology bring terrifying new levels of danger to humanity? We this deadly question by exploring some of the dangers posed by one of the most promising new technologies: nano-robotics. This one-houir program postulates an environmental clean-up robot the size of a molecule, which is hacked by a rogue engineer and turned into a spreading, flesh-consuming monster. In this scenario, it becomes clear that the only technology fit to fight back against this nano-robot is another robot a near-microscopic nano-aircraft built by the American military. The nano-weapon does handle the initial threat but when it spins out of control and begins attacking cities around the world, the cure becomes more deadly and world-threatening than the disease. Only by resorting to an improvised weapon radar used to fuse and melt the tiny inner workings of these military robots does humanity escape this gruesome fate.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz take on 63 year old Kel's 1962 Triumph TR4. Kel bought his beloved British roadster back in the 1970s and it became the car of his youth, he simply couldn't be parted from it – even when it finally gave up the ghost and ended up in storage – it was never far from his thoughts. His planned restoration sadly ground to a halt when a series of family tragedies and a brutal stroke that robbed him of most of his vision – meant that any plans to get his car back on the road were dashed. Tim and Fuzz steal the car away but quickly realise that they've taken on one of the biggest jobs in Car SOS history.

programme.title: Dead End Express
programme.desc: Throughout America's wilderness still lives a rare breed of off-the-grid individuals, dotted across the country in locations as secluded as they are serene. But not everything can be sourced from nature, and these untamed Americans sometimes require a helping hand, whether requiring medicine, food, or fuel. Delivering the goods to these remote individuals are a determined team of men, who reach those in need by bush plane, powerboat, packhorse, snowmobile or dogsled, going above and beyond to ensure their clients get their amenities, venturing to locations no other soul would dare. Documentary series.

programme.title: Dead End Express
programme.desc: Throughout America's wilderness still lives a rare breed of off-the-grid individuals, dotted across the country in locations as secluded as they are serene. But not everything can be sourced from nature, and these untamed Americans sometimes require a helping hand, whether requiring medicine, food, or fuel. Delivering the goods to these remote individuals are a determined team of men, who reach those in need by bush plane, powerboat, packhorse, snowmobile or dogsled, going above and beyond to ensure their clients get their amenities, venturing to locations no other soul would dare. Documentary series.

programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: The residents of Port Protection deal with the forces of nature, yet again. Curly Leach decides to support the community when he takes on pesky beavers. Sam Carlson finds it's time to start his garden and encounters bad soil so he has to search the surrounding area for the necessary ingredients to sweeten it up. With Hans and Timbi, rough weather and high winds complicate Timbi's situation when she suspects she has a life threatening blood clot and can't leave the island. Meanwhile, Gary Muehlberger sets out to do some King Salmon fishing and encounters another competitor of the sea, which jeopardizes his attempts to catch a fish.

programme.title: Tracing Heritage
programme.desc: From the Himalayan foothills to the sprawling metropolis of Chongqing, Harry Yuan journeys along the upper reaches of China's Yangtze to see how the river has shaped life along its course for centuries. Join Harry as he learns how the waterway both aided and challenged communities to survive, and how it was once a highway of diverse goods and influences that gave rise to rich traditions still practiced today.

programme.title: Alaska: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The next generation of Alaskans play by their own rules, rebelling against society norms and surviving Arctic climates. Michael Manzo travels nomadically in search of opportunity. Alex Javor leaves life in Virginia behind to build his dream cabin. The Rowlands instill critical lessons of survival to their children. And Brent and Ida work 24/7 on their business while navigating life as a new couple.

programme.title: Alaska: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The next generation of Alaskans play by their own rules, rebelling against society norms and surviving Arctic climates. Michael Manzo travels nomadically in search of opportunity. Alex Javor leaves life in Virginia behind to build his dream cabin. The Rowlands instill critical lessons of survival to their children. And Brent and Ida work 24/7 on their business while navigating life as a new couple.

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana Van Zeller
programme.desc: Award-winning journalist Mariana van Zeller explores the inner-workings of the global underworld's most dangerous black markets. In each episode, she journeys inside a different black market – from drugs to guns to tiger parts – to meet the players, learn the business, and unearth the geo-political circumstances and context that create the world's multi-trillion dollar shadow economy.

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana Van Zeller
programme.desc: Mariana van Zeller uncovers one of the world's most notorious smuggling routes from it's origin in the remote Peruvian jungle, to Colombia's Caribbean coast, all the way to the streets of Miami. Along the way, she learns how both the smugglers and the enforcers risk their lives while operating along the 4 decade old pipeline that's producing more cocaine not seen since the 1980s, despite the crackdown of the US War on drugs.

programme.title: Mars
programme.desc: In 2033, the first human mission to Mars enters the planet's atmosphere, but the Daedalus crew faces a life-threatening emergency when the ship's landing system goes offline. The crew's commander risks his life to fix the problem as Mission Control monitors back on Earth. Interwoven within the drama, in current day, SpaceX is attempting to land the world's first reusable rocket to pioneer the critical technology that will help humans reach Mars.

programme.title: Mars
programme.desc: From the National Geographic comes a science fiction series following a group of astronauts as they attempt to colonise Mars in 2033. With real-life scientists, the show is part documentary, part fictional narrative, as the scientists explain the actions of the astronauts in the dramatisations. The show is based on the book How We'll Live on Mars by Stephen Petranek and explores the difficulties the human race will endure if, or when, they attempt to set foot on the red planet. Created by Ben Young Mason and Justin Wilkes, the show was produced by Ron Howard and features performances from Ben Cotton, Jihae Kim, Clémentine Poidatz and Alberto Ammann.

programme.title: Mars
programme.desc: In 2033, the Daedalus mission is in jeopardy as the crew struggles to find a permanent shelter that can provide long-term protection from radiation. The team must locate a suitable site for their settlement before their mission is cut short. In reality, the European Space Agency and Roscosmos, Russia's former federal space agency, partner to launch an orbiter to help future Mars missions prepare for settlement through advanced imagery.

programme.title: Mars
programme.desc: It's 2037: four years have passed since the Daedalus crew landed on Mars and established its first settlement, Olympus Town. A new crew arrives to help execute plans for expansion and search for life when a dust storm threatens the outpost. In reality, the bustling McMurdo Station in Antarctica currently serves as a modern example of how humans will settle Mars as scientists look to discover life on another planet.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the 'Curse of the Afterlife'. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Egypt's Treasure Guardians
programme.desc: Egypt is home to many of the most famous archaeological treasures on Earth. But over the last five years, Egypt has suffered a tumultuous revolution and tourist numbers have plummeted. This programme follows a select cast of individuals, determined to bring Egypt back from the brink: to discover more of Egypt's history, to keep its heritage safe and to get tourists to visit the country again. Dr John Ward and Dr Maria Nilsson are a young charismatic couple who return year after year to a site in the south of the country, Gebel el Silsila. Dr Tarek Tawfik is a professor of archaeology tasked with running the biggest building project on the Giza plateau since the pyramids themselves: the Grand Egyptian Museum. Nora Shawki is a 26 year old PhD student exploring her first dig site in the Nile Delta, and Eddy Cannaerts is one of 5000 contractors working on the Grand Egyptian Museum, desperate to keep his build schedule on track. Together they are all hoping to get Egypt back on track, and bring the tourists back.

programme.title: Egypt with the World's Greatest Explorer
programme.desc: Sir Ranulph Fiennes & Joseph Fiennes gather at the port of Alexandria where they prep their Land Rovers for the voyage ahead, recreating Sir Ran's first ever expedition along the River Nile. Their journey to Cairo includes a crash course in survival techniques and a visit to see meat eating spiders, highly venomous scorpions and snakes. Further south in El Minya they crawl through narrow underground tombs, full of mummies.

programme.title: Egypt from Above
programme.desc: This fascinating documentary series which through aerial journey shows the entire spectacular country of Egypt, revealing how the nation of today was born from its dramatic past. The series will show from above how Egypt's harsh terrain has always been a huge challenge for those who live here. Airborne cameras will capture what it is like to exist in the sand dunes and how the mighty Nile is the life-line of the entire country, uncovering the secrets of the mighty pharaohs and their incredible engineering achievements such as the pyramids and the Valley of the Kings. But the audience will also have a chance to see how today's Egyptians are building on the legacy of their ancestors with amazing projects that include a new and modern capital city and world class tourist resorts.

programme.title: Airport Security: Rome
programme.desc: Police at Fiumicino Airport in Rome face many security threats. Agents stop a man with a hidden compartment in his suitcase concealing cocaine. Two Iranian passengers claim they are strangers, but their visas and stories are suspicious. A passenger tests positive for explosives. Police run down his checked bags to diffuse the threat. A woman carrying items for her brother is shocked to find out they are soaked with cocaine.

programme.title: Airport Security: First Class
programme.desc: The biggest cocaine busts from Airport Security Colombia and Peru. A man traveling to the DR, hides cocaine in children's organizers. A stepmom and daughter conceal bricks of cocaine inside jackets. A mother with a child carries cocaine in food packages and kid's clothes. The Anti-narcotics police find cocaine in a shipment of fresh herbs. A man going to Mexico with cocaine bricks in his carry-on. A man with liquid cocaine in beverage bottles.

programme.title: Airport Security: First Class
programme.desc: Stories of suspects who almost got away from Airport Security Colombia and Peru. A farmer swaps his suitcase with an accomplice in the terminal. A man who ingested cocaine is able to board a plane, but through international police coordination, is apprehended at his destination. A man with capsules in his stomach holds out for 36 hours and must be released. His sister is arrested. Cocaine cargo has been chemically disguised to fool officials.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: School of Rock

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: Freddy and Summer like each other a lot. So much so it's affecting their playing. The Austin Music Festival is coming up and it is Dewey's life-long dream to play it. The band audition, but they don't make it. Dewey is very disappointed, but he discovers his old band will be playing. It seems like he has to make a choice between School of Rock and his old band. The band support him in chasing his dream and his wish may finally come true.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie are two, 12-year-old girls who create a mobile game that becomes the most popular game of the year. With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: Josh is being silly but still can't get Blue to laugh! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what will make Blue laugh. While we look for clues we find patterns with a goofy gopher and locate all the mixed-up things in Silly Town.

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe
programme.desc: The owner of Butterbean's Cafe in the magical land of Puddlebrook is fairy Butterbean. Her cafe is a very comfortable and warm place, popular for its various dishes- cakes, pancakes, cookies, banana bread, salads cooked by herself, her friends Poppy, Dazzle, Jasper and her sister Poppy. Friends use extraordinary cooking appliances and a magic secret ingredient, that is why everything is so special and yummy. Their jealous rival is Ms. Marmalady, things are not going great at her cafe so she desperately wants to put Butterbean out of business. But true friendship and friends' support can conquer evil.

programme.title: Barbapapa – One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family. Each 11 minute episode will take a lead from Michael Bond's original books and, with the spirit of the new Paddington movies, tell brand new Paddington stories in an exciting new animated form. The show will appeal to both children and adults alike – adults will recognise the Paddington they know and love, and young children will discover him for the first time. The show is heavily influenced by the Paddington Feature Films but a key difference is the characters especially the Brown family have been aged down, more of a young family starting out than the comfortable middle aged ones we see in the films.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: PAW Patrol is a preschool series starring a pack of six heroic puppies: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Zuma, Rubble, and Skye, who are led by a tech-savvy 10-year-old boy named Ryder. With a unique blend of problem-solving skills, cool vehicles and lots of cute doggy humor, the PAW Patrol works together on high-stakes rescue missions to protect the Adventure Bay community.From Marshall the firedog to Chase the police pup to Skye, who flies high in her copter, each pup brings unique personality and skill to the team, modeling the importance of teamwork and good citizenship. They all have special Pup Packs on their backs to help them handle anything – from rescuing kittens to saving a train from a rockslide! And no matter how big the adventure, the PAW Patrol always has time for a game, a laugh, and an ear scratch from Ryder.Fun PAW Patrol Fact: Ryder rescued all the pups and taught them their PAW Patrol skills.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: It's Pony
programme.desc: Pony's constant distractions threaten to derail Annie's part of a science project Gerry is counting on her to do. On a trip to the bookstore, Annie and Pony discover the comfiest chair in the world that also may have superpowers.

programme.title: It's Pony
programme.desc: A normal girl's life is made extraordinary by her best friend – an unpredictable, outrageous, and hilarious talking pony. No matter the complications he causes, Annie knows that everything is better when Pony is around.

programme.title: City Adventures
programme.desc: Welcome to LEGO City. A modern metropolis filled with the fiercest firefighters, the cream of the crop cops, and so many BLOCKHEADS. Every citizen will assemble together for the most awesomely awesome adventures.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Ever wonder what it's like to grow up in a big family? Eleven-year-old Lincoln Loud gives viewers an inside look at how to survive the chaos of a huge household, especially as the only boy with ten sisters!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln is given the responsibility of taking home his classes' tarantula, but it gets loose and wreaks havoc! Thinking he has the worst chores, Lincoln decides to go on strike until someone will swap chores with him.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln is going to his first rock concert, and Luna is determined to make it the greatest experience ever. Lincoln finds a letter in the attic leading him to believe there is money hidden within the Loud house!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Casagrandes

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max Thunderman are 14-year-old twins who share a house, a school, a birthday, and a set of superpowers courtesy of their super-powered parents. Yet somehow, in the cosmic game of genetic roulette, Phoebe popped out of the womb good, while Max came out evil. This super-sibling rivalry, coupled with the typical school/family issues faced by your average kid ultimately leads to a series of hilarious situations.

programme.title: The Thundermans

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylan's grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their ''new normal'', and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about ''swag'' and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Everyone with siblings knows that sibling rivalry is a real thing, so imagine the sibling rivalry between quadruplets. That's everyday life for the Harper quadruplets Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn.Whilst you might assume they get on well, these four siblings have absolutely nothing in common which normally leads to family fights. Although everyday life can be tough they have to learn to work together to solve the endless problems that they find themselves facing. Produced by Nickelodeon this lighthearted American comedy series is sure to have you fits of giggles.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.desc: Lori takes a waitressing job at Dad's restaurant, but it turns out that serving is harder than she anticipated. Spurred on by a classmate's mocking about Charles, Lana decides to train him to compete in a local dog show.

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.title: Dubultie svešinieki
programme.desc: Filma stāsta par filmētāju no Ziemeļiem, kurš kopā ar fotogrāfi no Dienvidiem dodas uz svešu zemi. Tur mīt vēstures nogurdināti ļaudis un laiks tiecās sastingt, bet jebkura tikšanās ir greizais spogulis, lai ieskatītos pazīstamās acīs. Apvidus karte ir bezgalīga lasāmviela, kurā var ierakstīt arī savu stāstu.

programme.title: Uzrausim danci Valkā
programme.desc: Par godu 19.Latvijas tautas mūzikas svētkiem, 2016.gadā Valkas brīvdabas estrādē izskanēja dalībnieku dižkoncerts "Uzrausim danci Valkā". Koncertā uzstājās deju grupa "Dzirnas", Valkas ģimnāzijas jauniešu deju kolektīvs "Vendīgs" un Smiltenes Bērnu un jauniešu izglītības centra deju kolektīvs "Dadzīši". Uz skatuves kāpa arī pazīstamākās tautas mūzikas grupas. Koncerta pamattēma bija ceļojums cauri gadsimtiem mūsdienu muzeja noslēpumainās kolekcijās. Svētku radošā komanda ir instrumentālās tautas mūzikas eksperts Ilmārs Pumpurs, horeogrāfi Agris Daņilevičs un Dagmāra Leja, deju kolektīvu vadītājas Māra Leja un Vineta Skutāne, kā arī režisors Aivars Ikšelis un scenogrāfs Ivars Noviks.

programme.title: Парижские тайны
programme.desc: Исторический триллер о загадочных убийствах в самом романтичном городе мира. Париж, конец XIX века. По городу прокатывается серия загадочных убийств в самых известных и культурно значимых местах города: кабаре Мулен Руж, Парижская опера, Эйфелева башня… Смотрите детективный сериал с французским колоритом.

programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: Дельта
programme.desc: Андрей Бекетов приехал в дельту Волги отдохнуть и навестить своего друга Павла Лобанова, работающего инспектором рыбоохраны. Когда-то они вместе служили в спецназе, потом Лобанов вернулся в родную деревню, а Бекетов ушел на работу в городскую полицию, но был оттуда уволен за излишнюю принципиальность…

programme.title: Морские дьяволы
programme.desc: В сериале идёт рассказ о работе и взаимоотношениях членов специального подразделения. Его сформировали из лучших обученных бойцов для возможности вести бои во всех трёх ипостасях: на морских, земных и воздушных просторах. Их группа состоит из четвёрки отважных людей, каждый из которой способен работать за всех остальных. Их стали все и повсеместно называть "морскими дьяволами" ведь основные миссии, ставящие перед ними, связаны именно с водной стихией. Пока ещё не было перед ними поставлено такой задачи, которая стала неподвластной этой четвёрке. Каждый из них уникален по-своему и хоть они очень разные, но придерживаются одной цели – всегда с честью подходить к выполнению профессионального долга.

programme.title: Дорожные войны
programme.desc: Ежедневно сотрудники ГИБДД становятся участниками настоящих ожесточенных дорожных войн. Они в курсе всех происшествий, которые происходят на трассах России, и изо всех сил стараются вовремя догнать преступника и призвать его к уголовной ответственности. Каждая подобная операция балансирует на грани жизни и смерти, справедливости и безнаказанности. Программа позволит посмотреть на самые запоминающиеся случаи на дороге. Эта передача придется по душе всем поклонникам динамичных погонь и автомобильных преследований. Все события происходят на бешеной скорости, нужно смотреть в оба, чтобы догнать виновного, но при этом самому не навлечь на себя опасность. Пронзительный вой мигалок и скрежет асфальта под колесами разбушевавшихся автомобилей — этого будет вдоволь в каждом выпуске. Программа Дорожные войны основывается исключительно на достоверных источниках. Сюжет всегда подтверждается записями видеорегистраторов свидетелей, самих нарушителей либо сотрудников правоохранительных органов. Иногда им удается запечатлеть просто невероятные моменты, которые по увлекательности не уступают даже популярным боевикам. Увидев качество их работы, количество нарушающих правила дорожного движения просто обязано сократиться.

programme.title: Пападос-шоу
programme.desc: Юмористическая телепрограмма подарит телезрителям массу эмоций — от восторга до испуга. В каждом выпуске телешоу "Пападос шоу" собраны розыгрыши, снятые скрытой камерой в разных странах мира. Это нестандартные ситуации, вызывающие неожиданную реакцию прохожих. Камера фиксирует, как реагируют люди разного возраста на унитаз или душевую кабину в лифте, труп на улице или пленника в багажнике машины. Ведущие предлагают повторить пранки, а автор лучшего видео может получить приз от программы.

programme.desc: Par medicīnu kā par zinātni, praksi, pieredzi, empātiju, pārvaldību un mākslu. Dr. Pēteris Apinis sarunāsies ar Latvijas un pasaules medicīnas guru.

programme.title: Kārtības rullis
programme.desc: Žurnālists Armands Puče kopā ar viesiem diskutē par to, kā tiek virzīti procesi Latvijā un kā tiek pieņemti lēmumi, kas ietekmē visas Latvijas tautas dzīvi.

programme.title: Dienas personība
programme.desc: Raidījums, kurā katru darba dienu tiek aicināta kāda aktuāla personība attiecīgajam laikam, pilsētas aktualitātēm un notikumiem.

programme.title: Xploration Nature Knows Best
programme.desc: Hosted by marine biologist Danni Washington, this is a fascinating STEM series which focuses on the fun and inventive ways that scientists, engineers and inventors have taken inspiration from Mother Nature's methods in order to develop incredible advancements in their fields. By copying the ways that plants and animals have developed, the human innovators can utilise similar approaches to evolve modern technology for everyday use. From advances such as a new type of glass inspired by spider webs that will stop birds from crashing into it; to tiny robots based on manta rays that are helping to fight heart problems; and creating a new type of camera based on the study of squids.

programme.title: Deadly Nightmares of Nature
programme.desc: Naomi travels the world to find the worst nightmare of nature.

programme.title: The Mystery Files
programme.desc: A little bit of mystery makes history a lot more fun. Join cousins E.B and Kyla, as they unwrap the clues left for them by the mysterious Great Aunt Hermione and every Mystery File leads to a new adventure! The Sherlockian duo have inherited the mixed-up files of Great Aunt Hermione, explorer extraordinaire. Each file presents three seemingly unrelated objects from the past, and it's up to the gang to figure out how these artifacts connect to who we are and how we live now. Each mystery unravels new discoveries from around the world, like: How has the invention of flight changed the "size" of our world? Did the Vikings set foot in North America hundreds of years before any other Europeans? Are the undead real? And how does the way we measure time change the way we live?

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Junior Vets
programme.desc: Six children get the opportunity to see what it is like to be a veterinarian first hand. The kids get to go to the University of Edinburgh to attend within the Royal School Of Veterinary Studies where they get to go into the veterinary hospitals and get involved in the real life cases. In hopes of inspiring the children about veterinary practices the kids get to get hands on in helping the ill animals and are taught how to get them back to health. Going through a range of challenges the children attend events, zoos and wildlife hospitals treating an array of animals. At the end of the series on of the participants will be crowned Head Vet for demonstrating excellent veterinary skills.

programme.title: Super Human Challenge
programme.desc: Children's series. Join presenter Tim Fitzhigham as he scours the world for people with astonishing abilities and real life super powers. With help from his assistant Doctor Megan John, Tim challenges these extraordinary individuals to see just how super-human they are. From the arctic to the bottom of the ocean, Tim leaves no stone left unturned, and in his quest for super humans, he manages to find a man who can see with his ears! Prepare to be astounded as these science-defying men and women leave Tim lost for words. With extraordinary physical abilities and unbelievable stamina, Tim will need to all the help he can get from Doctor Megan if he is to stand a chance against these incredible human beings.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: The Planets
programme.desc: Join Professor Brian Cox as he explores the planets of our solar system in this fascinating and stunning, five-part documentary series. Brian traces our knowledge as a species of these giant, celestial bodies, examining each planet's story and makeup. He looks back at their existence over billions of years, revealing each planet's journey with dazzling cinematography and compelling detail. Whether it's the gargantuan size of Jupiter, the mysterious history of Saturn or the complexion of the four inner most planets, this series is informative and beautiful in equal measure.

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Ride or Wrong
programme.desc: Hosted by Emily Agard, Ride or Wrong is an adrenaline-filled series that gets your pulse pounding as teen contestants answer trivia questions while riding extreme amusement park rides. Each episode centres on one unsuspecting teen contestant who has no idea that they are about to be on a quiz show. Once the contestants are securely strapped in and the ride is twisting and turning at extreme speeds, our host poses a variety of trivia questions ranging from pop culture to science. Every correct answer earns our contestants points, which are added up at the end of each ride. Contestants must rely on their intelligence as well as their ability to focus under extreme conditions as they experience some of fastest and tallest rides the amusement park has to offer.

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space
programme.desc: Host Emily Calandrelli, MIT Engineer and astronautics expert takes viewers on incredible journeys through space. She visits various NASA facilities, private space companies, and interviews space experts in search of answers about our universe.

programme.title: Fierce Earth
programme.desc: A rumble in the earth, tsunami in the sea, or twister moving in... these catastrophic events in nature have destructive outcomes, and this is the story of the devastation they leave. The Fierce Earth team are here to take a look at some of our planets most powerful forces, why they happen and the results of their occurrence. See shocking footage of avalanches, lighting strikes, wildfires and hurricanes, and learn how you can stay as safe as possible in the event of one of Earths fiercest natural events.

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Andy Day is on a Jurassic mission to explore the lost world of the dinosaurs in this children's series. Using his unique, time-travelling clock, he ventures back to prehistoric times, when these gigantic animals ruled the forests, plains, oceans and skies. Helping him along the way is trusted friend Hatty, a dinosaur expert and palaeontologist, who prepares exhibits in the dinosaur section of the National Museum. Though caring and thoughtful, Andy's mishaps and accidents at the museum are often the reason for his time-travelling antics, as he must replace any broken items before Hatty's exhibits open.

programme.title: Xploration Nature Knows Best
programme.desc: Hosted by marine biologist Danni Washington, this is a fascinating STEM series which focuses on the fun and inventive ways that scientists, engineers and inventors have taken inspiration from Mother Nature's methods in order to develop incredible advancements in their fields. By copying the ways that plants and animals have developed, the human innovators can utilise similar approaches to evolve modern technology for everyday use. From advances such as a new type of glass inspired by spider webs that will stop birds from crashing into it; to tiny robots based on manta rays that are helping to fight heart problems; and creating a new type of camera based on the study of squids.

programme.title: Hey You! What If…
programme.desc: Hey You! What If...is a British children's series with a fun approach to get children interested in science. Each episode answers scientific questions, as the main character goes through impossible situations, with madcap experiments created by visual effects and motion graphics. Anything becomes real in this thought-provoking show, as possibilities of time travel, flat Earth and even a moon made of cheese are explored.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Super Human Challenge
programme.desc: Children's series. Join presenter Tim Fitzhigham as he scours the world for people with astonishing abilities and real life super powers. With help from his assistant Doctor Megan John, Tim challenges these extraordinary individuals to see just how super-human they are. From the arctic to the bottom of the ocean, Tim leaves no stone left unturned, and in his quest for super humans, he manages to find a man who can see with his ears! Prepare to be astounded as these science-defying men and women leave Tim lost for words. With extraordinary physical abilities and unbelievable stamina, Tim will need to all the help he can get from Doctor Megan if he is to stand a chance against these incredible human beings.

programme.title: Deadly Nightmares of Nature
programme.desc: Naomi travels the world to find the worst nightmare of nature.

programme.title: Junior Vets
programme.desc: Six children get the opportunity to see what it is like to be a veterinarian first hand. The kids get to go to the University of Edinburgh to attend within the Royal School Of Veterinary Studies where they get to go into the veterinary hospitals and get involved in the real life cases. In hopes of inspiring the children about veterinary practices the kids get to get hands on in helping the ill animals and are taught how to get them back to health. Going through a range of challenges the children attend events, zoos and wildlife hospitals treating an array of animals. At the end of the series on of the participants will be crowned Head Vet for demonstrating excellent veterinary skills.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Madagascar
programme.desc: Eight British children leave the comfort of the homes to work alongside Madagascar's wildlife conservationists in this life-changing documentary series. Madagascar is a biodiversity hotspot, home to unique plants and animals that face an existential threat due to a growing human population and environmental changes. More than 90% of the island's wildlife is found only on Madagascar, and these eight young volunteers are here to help the passionate conservationists with protecting the remarkable native species. Narrated by Steve Backshall, follow the children as they learn about the incredible animals and extraordinary plants that are in danger of being lost from the planet.

programme.title: Fierce Earth
programme.desc: A rumble in the earth, tsunami in the sea, or twister moving in... these catastrophic events in nature have destructive outcomes, and this is the story of the devastation they leave. The Fierce Earth team are here to take a look at some of our planets most powerful forces, why they happen and the results of their occurrence. See shocking footage of avalanches, lighting strikes, wildfires and hurricanes, and learn how you can stay as safe as possible in the event of one of Earths fiercest natural events.

programme.title: The Mystery Files
programme.desc: A little bit of mystery makes history a lot more fun. Join cousins E.B and Kyla, as they unwrap the clues left for them by the mysterious Great Aunt Hermione and every Mystery File leads to a new adventure! The Sherlockian duo have inherited the mixed-up files of Great Aunt Hermione, explorer extraordinaire. Each file presents three seemingly unrelated objects from the past, and it's up to the gang to figure out how these artifacts connect to who we are and how we live now. Each mystery unravels new discoveries from around the world, like: How has the invention of flight changed the "size" of our world? Did the Vikings set foot in North America hundreds of years before any other Europeans? Are the undead real? And how does the way we measure time change the way we live?

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space
programme.desc: Host Emily Calandrelli, MIT Engineer and astronautics expert takes viewers on incredible journeys through space. She visits various NASA facilities, private space companies, and interviews space experts in search of answers about our universe.

programme.title: Ride or Wrong
programme.desc: Hosted by Emily Agard, Ride or Wrong is an adrenaline-filled series that gets your pulse pounding as teen contestants answer trivia questions while riding extreme amusement park rides. Each episode centres on one unsuspecting teen contestant who has no idea that they are about to be on a quiz show. Once the contestants are securely strapped in and the ride is twisting and turning at extreme speeds, our host poses a variety of trivia questions ranging from pop culture to science. Every correct answer earns our contestants points, which are added up at the end of each ride. Contestants must rely on their intelligence as well as their ability to focus under extreme conditions as they experience some of fastest and tallest rides the amusement park has to offer.

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Andy Day is on a Jurassic mission to explore the lost world of the dinosaurs in this children's series. Using his unique, time-travelling clock, he ventures back to prehistoric times, when these gigantic animals ruled the forests, plains, oceans and skies. Helping him along the way is trusted friend Hatty, a dinosaur expert and palaeontologist, who prepares exhibits in the dinosaur section of the National Museum. Though caring and thoughtful, Andy's mishaps and accidents at the museum are often the reason for his time-travelling antics, as he must replace any broken items before Hatty's exhibits open.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: The Planets
programme.desc: Join Professor Brian Cox as he explores the planets of our solar system in this fascinating and stunning, five-part documentary series. Brian traces our knowledge as a species of these giant, celestial bodies, examining each planet's story and makeup. He looks back at their existence over billions of years, revealing each planet's journey with dazzling cinematography and compelling detail. Whether it's the gargantuan size of Jupiter, the mysterious history of Saturn or the complexion of the four inner most planets, this series is informative and beautiful in equal measure.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Madagascar
programme.desc: Eight British children leave the comfort of the homes to work alongside Madagascar's wildlife conservationists in this life-changing documentary series. Madagascar is a biodiversity hotspot, home to unique plants and animals that face an existential threat due to a growing human population and environmental changes. More than 90% of the island's wildlife is found only on Madagascar, and these eight young volunteers are here to help the passionate conservationists with protecting the remarkable native species. programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: SmartMix
programme.desc: The smartest mix of the best music available through the night! Just turn it on!

programme.desc: Stipriausi pasaulio žmonės kausis dėl čempionų vardo. Lietuvos galiūnų komandoje – Žydrūnas Savickas, Vilius Petrauskas, Saulius Brusokas, Vidas Blekaitis bei ekipos debiutantas mažeikietis Vytautas Lalas.

Ispanijos Endesa krepšinio lyga. Trečios rungtynės: "Barca" – Tenerifės "Lenova"
Помнить
programme.desc: 80-летний Зев Гуттман многие годы пытался забыть Освенцим, а теперь он благословлён деменцией и доживает дни в специализированном учреждении. Жена недавно умерла, а друг Макс Розенбаум напоминает, что на похоронах Зев поклялся отомстить офицеру СС, убившему их семьи в концлагере. Оказывается, тому удалось сбежать и спокойно жить все эти годы под чужим именем. Но сам Макс прикован к инвалидному креслу, поэтому миссия возмездия возлагается на Зева: у него есть наличные, билеты на транспорт и письмо, в котором подробно и последовательно описаны необходимые шаги. Его цель – посетить четырёх подозреваемых по имени Руди Курландер.

programme.title: Смертельное Везение
programme.desc: Криминальный триллер о двух очень разных детективах, которых бросают на раскрытие убийства, и которые в реальной жизни готовы поубивать друг друга. Эта динамичная история раскручивается с точки зрения главных героев: Грейс Гиббс (Рэйчел Гриффитс) одержима поимкой вооруженного грабителя, убившего ее младшего коллегу-офицера, а Чарли Фунг (Йосон Ан), ее новый стажер, обвиняет ее в смерти своего лучшего друга. Тем временем, на окраине города скрывается жестокий преступник. В течение недели пути героев пересекаются, оставляя двух человек мертвыми и одного, пропавшим без вести.

programme.title: Богиня
programme.desc: Элсбет Диккенс — домохозяйка и мама двух чудесных близнецов. Её муж Джеймс работает в Гринпис и постоянно отсутствует дома, спасая то китов, то осьминогов. Чтобы между ними была какая то связь, Джеймс установил дома веб-камеру. Однажды Элсбет решила спеть перед ней песню, не зная, что трансляция идёт в интернет, и на следующий день проснулась знаменитой. Ей предложило контракт крупное рекламное агентство, и она уехала в столицу, оставив близнецов на няню. Столичная жизнь полна соблазнов, Элсбет ждёт мировой контракт. Что она выберет — славу и деньги или любовь мужа, которого никогда нет дома?

programme.title: Первая любовь
programme.desc: Уже стареющий комедиант-бонвиван Уго Кремонези, чей актёрский псевдоним — Пиккио (то есть Дятел), влюбляется в прекрасную молодую девушку Ренату, горничную из дома для престарелых под названием "Вилла Серена". Немало повеселившийся в жизни "мелкий донжуан", даже уйдя на покой, продолжает дерзко и вульгарно шутить, смущая нравы тихих обитателей богадельни. Однако его платоническое чувство к Ренате в конечном счёте позволяет герою испытать истинные любовные переживания.

programme.title: Жмот
programme.desc: Франсуа Готье — виртуозный скрипач. Но за талант, как водится, надо платить. У музыканта серьезный недостаток: он невероятно скуп. Мания экономить превращает его в одержимого, а любой платеж ввергает в панический ужас. Но однажды его жизнь резко меняется.

programme.title: Помнить
programme.desc: 80-летний Зев Гуттман многие годы пытался забыть Освенцим, а теперь он благословлён деменцией и доживает дни в специализированном учреждении. Жена недавно умерла, а друг Макс Розенбаум напоминает, что на похоронах Зев поклялся отомстить офицеру СС, убившему их семьи в концлагере. Оказывается, тому удалось сбежать и спокойно жить все эти годы под чужим именем. Но сам Макс прикован к инвалидному креслу, поэтому миссия возмездия возлагается на Зева: у него есть наличные, билеты на транспорт и письмо, в котором подробно и последовательно описаны необходимые шаги. Его цель – посетить четырёх подозреваемых по имени Руди Курландер.

programme.title: Смертельное Везение
programme.desc: Криминальный триллер о двух очень разных детективах, которых бросают на раскрытие убийства, и которые в реальной жизни готовы поубивать друг друга. Эта динамичная история раскручивается с точки зрения главных героев: Грейс Гиббс (Рэйчел Гриффитс) одержима поимкой вооруженного грабителя, убившего ее младшего коллегу-офицера, а Чарли Фунг (Йосон Ан), ее новый стажер, обвиняет ее в смерти своего лучшего друга. Тем временем, на окраине города скрывается жестокий преступник. В течение недели пути героев пересекаются, оставляя двух человек мертвыми и одного, пропавшим без вести.

programme.title: Афера в Майами
programme.desc: Кубинское правительство направляет в Майами своих шпионов для предотвращения терактов, организуемых враждебными группировками. Но агенты под прикрытием не только успешно исполняют свою миссию, но и оказываются втянуты в подпольную торговлю кокаином, что грозит мировым скандалом.

programme.title: Идеальная пятница для преступления
programme.desc: П.МакКенна. Молодая пара решает ограбить банк без использования огнестрельного оружия, но с первого раза у них ничего не получается...

programme.title: Суперкласико
programme.desc: Бертельсен, Джэми Мортон, Паприка Стеэн. Кристиану следует признать: налаженная жизнь катится к черту, сын-подросток, как многие в его возрасте, не желает общаться с отцом, а торговля элитными винами летит в пропасть из-за того, что чаще всего он сам потребляет свой товар. Но самое главное – от Кристиана ушла жена. И не просто ушла, а собирается замуж за… звезду мирового футбола, супермена, машину для секса! Какой мужчина в состоянии пережить это и не сойти с ума? В отчаянной попытке вернуть жену герой отправляется в Буэнос-Айрес...

programme.title: Убей меня трижды
programme.desc: Молодая женщина, живущая в австралийском городке, является нитью, которая связывает три истории – убийства, шантажа и мести.

programme.title: Galvestona
programme.desc: Rojs ir nonācis mafijas bosa nežēlastībā, tāpēc ir jāslēpjas no slepkavām 19 gadus vecas prostitūtas un viņas mazās māsas kompānijā. Vienīgā iespēja izglābties ir piejūras pilsētiņa Galvestona.

programme.title: Pēdējā robeža
programme.desc: Bijušais narkotiku apkarošanas aģents kopā ar ģimeni pārceļas uz dzīvi mazpilsētā, kur drīz vien iesaistās cīņā ar vietējo narkotirgoni. Galvenajās lomās - Džeisons Steitems un Džeimss Franko. 2013

programme.title: Eņģeļa krišana
programme.desc: Slepenā dienesta aģentu vaino uzbrukumā ASV prezidentam. Lai atgūtu savu labo slavu, viņš aizbēg no FIB un dodas uzbrukuma pasūtītāju meklējumos.

programme.title: K-19
programme.desc: Harisons Fords un Laiems Nīsons atveido galvenās lomas šai elpu aizraujošajā filmā, kas balstīta uz šausminošo notikumu 1961. gadā aukstā kara laikā.

programme.desc: Puse Francijas bija zem nacistu okupācijas 2. pasaules kara laikā. Šī filma stāsta par Vilenēvu -- kalnu ciemu Francijā, kuru vācu zaldāti ieņēma pašu pirmo 1940. gadā.

programme.desc: Filma pēc kulta spēles "Street Fighter" motīviem. 1994. g.

programme.desc: Filma ir balstīta uz patiesiem notikumiem — naftas platformas strādnieki ir nokļuvuši bīstamākās 21. gadsimta tehnogēnās katastrofas epicentrā. 2016. g.

programme.title: Endera spēle
programme.desc: Jauno Enderu Viginsu iesauc starptautiskajā armijā vadīt cīņu ar naidīgu citplanētiešu rasi, kas iepriekšējā uzbrukuma laikā iznīcinājusi cilvēci. 2013
